notes: Stylishly renovated apartment with modern industrial-chic design featuring wood flooring, built-in cabinetry, designer pendant lighting, and central AC. The building exterior appears well-maintained with 8 floors suggesting elevator access. For baby safety, the wall-mounted metal shelving has open horizontal bars that could be climbed, and the unit appears unfurnished with minimal visible hazards. Good natural light from windows, overall clean and contemporary condition.
